description: Test case with a React component and a utility helper file, demonstrating various lint errors.

payload.lintErrors:
app/components/MyComponent.tsx
  3:7  Error   'oldSyntax' is never reassigned. Use 'const' instead. (prefer-const)
  4:3  Warning 'console.log' is not allowed. (no-console)

utils/helpers.ts
  1:20 Error   Missing an explicit type for parameter 'a'. (typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type)
  1:23 Error   Missing an explicit type for parameter 'b'. (typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type)
  5:12 Warning 'unusedVar' is assigned a value but never used. (@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars)
